name: Izzy - Shoot the ball!
description:
This is my new game “IZZY“ on google play.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.berkeozkir.izzy

I want to know you guys opinions.  How is the graphics?  Would you add or remove any feature to this game?

If you guys support me anyway and  drop a review with 5 stars. That would be great.

THANK YOU!

This game is 2D basically you should shoot the balls to the same colors boxes in order to destroy and collect points other wise ball pops up and you won't get any points.
